posts.post_content: Email if you need this for your set.  [url]Esharpwork@gmail.com[/url]
Last bump.  Card will be available this weekend and then off of the market and back in the safe.

Growing season is mostly over for me at my farm.  I got my garlic planted and mulched so I'm having a Vic Saier sale to celebrate having a few spare minutes a day.  Let me know if you're interested in this tough card and let's work out a deal.  [url]esharpwork@gmail.com[/url]
